subject: Dear Confidant,
body:
Dear Confidant,
I have come to you with good intentions. I am Dr. Ferguson Themba, The Director of Logistics and Procurement in the department of Health Republic of South Africa. During the Covid 19 Pandemic my department and the Government of the Republic of South Africa engaged foreign contractors for the Supply of the Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
During the period under review, myself and few others in the Department of Health and some officials of the Government intentionally over-involved all PPE Contracts within the 7 Months  the  national Lockdown to the tune of US$25,800,000.00 ( Twenty Five Million Eight Hundred Thousand United States Dollars).
Let me remind you that our Government voted about US$50billion to caution the effect of the pandemic, it is on this premise we decided all have a little share of the fund, I want to equally inform you that the real contractors has been paid fully and this fund is currently floating a special account with a commercial bank here in South Africa.
Therefore in view of my career and a senior Civil Servant, I cannot claim this fund, I want to invite you to come and stand as the legal beneficiary of the fund, you will be provided  with the documents to claim the fund through the legal  detects of the Country, You will be guided on how to claim the fund.
Let me know if you are interested to partner with me, for your participation, 30% of the fund is yours while 70% for me and my colleagues.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Dr. Ferguson Themba
Director,
Logistics& procurement
Phone: +27786839732
Email: 
fergusonthemba@consultant.com

subject: Re:   Dear Confidant,
body:
Hello Dr. Ferguson Themba,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information? 

Also, could you please elaborate more on the process of claiming the fund? What kind of documents would be provided to me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Milton

subject: Re: Dear Confidant,
body:
Dear, 
 
I honestly believe that you are the right person to partner with, my intention is for you to invest all the money US$25,800,000.00 into lucrative businesses. 
 
During the period under review, myself and few others in the Department of Health and some officials of the Government intentionally over involved all PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) Contracts within the 7 Months of the national Lockdown to the tune of US$25,800,000.00 (Twenty Five Million Eight Hundred Thousand United States Dollars). 
 
Let me remind you that our Government voted about US$50billion to caution the effect of the pandemic, it is on this premise we decided to have a little share of the fund, I want to equally inform you that the real contractors has been paid fully and this fund is currently floating in a special account with a private Investment Bank  in South Africa. 
 
Therefore in view of my career and as senior Civil Servant, I cannot claim this fund, I want to invite you to come and stand as the legal beneficiary of the fund, you will be provided with the documents to claim the fund   through the legal detects of the South Africa and your Country, You will be guided on how to claim the fund. Let me know if you are interested to partner with me, for your participation, 30% of the fund is yours while 70% for me and my colleagues. 
 
This fund is with a private investment banking firm in South Africa, first before I introduce you to the bank as the sole beneficiary/ legal owner of the money, I would like us to sign a mutual agreement, where our sharing ratios and liability to each other will be signed on a legal document. 
 
Do not worry as I have worked everything out  the procedural modality since it is an insider job; the essence of this exercise is to give the transfer the legality as a confirmation that the source of funds is genuine. 
 
I come to you in peace and with good intention, I am hoping that you will  not betray my trust and confidence, I am confident that you will invest the funds in good investments for our future  benefit. 
I shall send you other relevant modality as soon as I hear from you. 
 
Please do confirm the receipt of this  email. 
Send me details of your personal information: 
 
1, Your Full Names 
2. Address 
3. Present occupation 
4. Date of Birth 
 
I look forward to hearing from you. 
 
Regards, 
Dr. Ferguson Themba 
Director, Logistics& procurement 
Department of Health 
Republic of South Africa 
Email: fergusonthemba@consultant.com 
Phone: +27643090037 
 
 
 Sent: Friday, February 09, 2024 at 9:05 AM From: "Milton" <vv71589@***.com> To: fergusonthemba@consultant.com Subject: Re: Dear Confidant, 
 
Hello Dr. Ferguson Themba, 
Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information? 
Also, could you please elaborate more on the process of claiming the fund? What kind of documents would be provided to me? 
Looking forward to your response. 
Best regards.
Best wishes, 
Milton

subject: Re: Dear Confidant,
body:
Hello Dr. Ferguson Themba,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this intriguing situation with me. I must say, it's not every day that one gets an opportunity like this. I'm curious though, how did you come across my contact information?

Also, could you please elaborate more on the process of claiming the fund? What kind of documents would be provided to me? And what does signing a mutual agreement entail?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Milton
